name: Sony PlayStation 5 (Slim Model)
description: Sony PlayStation 5 (Slim Model) - Game console with Ultra HD Blu-ray drive, 1TB SSD, Tempest 3D AudioTech, and DualSense Wireless Controller.

name: Valve Steam Deck OLED
description: Valve Steam Deck OLED - Handheld gaming PC with a 7.4-inch HDR OLED display, 512GB NVMe SSD, and Wi-Fi 6E.

name: Meta Quest 3
description: Meta Quest 3 - Mixed Reality Headset with 128 GB of storage, improved passthrough technology, and Touch Plus controllers.

name: Sony Alpha 7 IV
description: Sony Alpha 7 IV - Full-frame mirrorless camera with a 33 MP sensor, 4K 60p video, fast hybrid autofocus, and a vari-angle screen.

name: GoPro HERO12 Black
description: GoPro HERO12 Black - Action camera with 5.3K60 video, HyperSmooth 6.0 stabilization, HDR, and a waterproof housing.

name: DJI Mini 4 Pro
description: DJI Mini 4 Pro - Lightweight camera drone under 249g with 4K/60fps HDR video, omnidirectional obstacle avoidance, and 34 min. flight time.

name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro - 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and a professional camera system with a 48 MP main camera.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra - Smartphone with an integrated S Pen, 200 MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and Galaxy AI features.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Pixel 8 Pro - Android smartphone with Google Tensor G3 chip, 6.7-inch Super Actua display, and AI-powered camera features.

name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
description: Apple Watch Ultra 2 - Rugged smartwatch with a titanium case, extra-bright display, precision dual-frequency GPS, and advanced health and outdoor features.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic
description: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic - Smartwatch with a classic watch design, rotating bezel, sapphire crystal glass, and Wear OS.

name: Oura Ring Gen 3
description: Oura Ring Gen 3 - Smart ring for monitoring sleep, activity, and recovery. Titanium construction with temperature sensors.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Sony WH-1000XM5 - Wireless noise-canceling headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation, excellent sound quality, and 30 hours of battery life.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) - In-ear headphones with adaptive audio, active noise cancellation, and personalized spatial audio.

name: Sonos Era 100
description: Sonos Era 100 - Next-generation compact smart speaker with room-filling stereo sound, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, and voice control.

name: Nintendo Switch (OLED Model)
description: Nintendo Switch (OLED Model) - Game console with a 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, a wide adjustable stand, and 64 GB of internal storage.

name: Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT 2
description: Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT 2 - Ultralight wireless gaming mouse (60g) with LIGHTSPEED technology, HERO 2 sensor, and LIGHTFORCE hybrid switches.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless
description: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless - Multi-system gaming headset with active noise cancellation, Hi-Res Audio, and the GameDAC Gen 2.

name: Dell Alienware AW3423DWF
description: Dell Alienware AW3423DWF - 34-inch QD-OLED gaming monitor with a 165Hz refresh rate, WQHD resolution, and Quantum Dot technology for superior colors.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Canon EOS R6 Mark II - Full-frame mirrorless camera with a 24.2 MP sensor, 4K60p video (uncropped), and advanced Dual Pixel CMOS AF II.

name: Sony ZV-E1
description: Sony ZV-E1 - Compact full-frame vlogging camera with interchangeable lenses, AI-powered autofocus, dynamic active mode, and cinematic presets.

name: Insta360 X4
description: Insta360 X4 - 8K 360° action camera with an invisible selfie stick effect, FlowState stabilization, 360° horizon lock, and a waterproof body.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5
description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5 - Foldable smartphone with a large 7.6-inch main display, multi-window functionality, S Pen compatibility, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 2.

name: Nothing Phone (2)
description: Nothing Phone (2) - Smartphone with a unique Glyph Interface on the back, Nothing OS 2.0, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, and a dual 50 MP camera.

name: Garmin Fenix 7 Pro Solar Edition
description: Garmin Fenix 7 Pro Solar Edition - Multisport GPS smartwatch with solar charging, a built-in LED flashlight, and advanced training metrics.

name: Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses (Wayfarer)
description: Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses (Wayfarer) - Smart glasses with an integrated 12 MP camera, five microphones, open-ear speakers, and live streaming capability.

name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds
description: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds - True wireless earbuds with world-class noise cancellation, CustomTune technology, and immersive Bose Immersive Audio.

name: Sennheiser AMBEO Soundbar Plus
description: Sennheiser AMBEO Soundbar Plus - Compact all-in-one soundbar with immersive 3D sound (Dolby Atmos, DTS:X), 7.1.4 channel performance, and automatic room calibration.

name: Shure SM7B
description: Shure SM7B - Legendary dynamic vocal microphone, ideal for professional podcasting, streaming, and studio recording. Requires an audio interface.

name: Logitech G PRO X 60 LIGHTSPEED
description: Logitech G PRO X 60 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Keyboard with a 60% layout and optical switches.
